QuestData.Title: Hidden Power
QuestData.Description: Our temple defenders have battled relentlessly for hours. No doubt they grow tired.$B$BI will give you mantras to deliver to our fighters.$B$BDo not be fooled by these pieces of paper. These ancient scriptures hold words of untold power.
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver Ancient Mantras to 6 Yu'lon Guardians or Yu'lon Adepts.
